job_tasks.phrase: turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to translating concepts into actionable work and managing project constraints, which falls under understanding and aligning with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
job_tasks.justification: Defining strategy and governance requires understanding business goals and how M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online fit into them.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
job_tasks.justification: Participating in user stories implies involvement in the development lifecycle and implementation of features.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions and advise on data control
job_tasks.justification: Implementing solutions and advising on data control are core software development activities focused on practical application.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining services is a direct description of software development work.

job_tasks.phrase: Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: Advising users on tool usage based on guidelines involves understanding business processes and compliance.

job_tasks.phrase: work on our M365 Copilot Scale-up project
job_tasks.justification: Scaling up a project, especially involving a new technology like M365 Copilot, often involves operational considerations for deployment and management.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams.
solve problems as they come up
ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated.
develop yourself and expand your expertise.
Collaboration with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.

classification.rationale: This role focuses heavily on Microsoft 365 suite, including M365 Copilot, with responsibilities centered around strategy, implementation, and support of these platforms. While M365 Copilot involves AI, the core tasks described lean more towards platform engineering and business process integration rather than deep model development or the specialized skills of a GenAI Engineer.
